name: R4B-MedicationDispense-R5-MedicationDispense
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B MedicationDispense into FHIR R5

element.display: Dispensing a medication to a named patient

target.display: Dispensing a medication to a named patient
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense`

element.display: Medication order that authorizes the dispense

target.display: Medication order that authorizes the dispense
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.authorizingPrescription` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.authorizingPrescription`

target.display: Type of medication dispense
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.category` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationDispense.category` - category changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); category changed the binding strength from Preferred to Example

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.contained`

element.display: Amount of medication expressed as a timing amount

target.display: Amount of medication expressed as a timing amount
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.daysSupply` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.daysSupply`

target.display: Where the medication was/will be sent
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.destination` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.destination`

element.display: How the medication is to be used by the patient or administered by the caregiver

target.display: How the medication is to be used by the patient or administered by the caregiver
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.dosageInstruction` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationDispense.dosageInstruction` - dosageInstruction has change due to type change: R4B `dosageInstruction` `Dosage` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `dosageInstruction`

element.display: A list of relevant lifecycle events

target.display: A list of relevant lifecycle events
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.eventHistory` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.eventHistory`

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationDispense.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.id`

target.display: External identifier
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.implicitRules`

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationDispense.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

target.display: Where the dispense occurred
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.location` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.location`

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.meta`

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationDispense.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

target.display: Information about the dispense
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `MedicationDispense.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

element.display: Event that dispense is part of

target.display: Event that dispense is part of
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.partOf` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `MedicationDispense.partOf` - partOf has change due to type change: R4B `partOf` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `partOf`

target.display: Who performed event
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.performer` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.performer`

target.display: Individual who was performing
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.performer.actor` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `MedicationDispense.performer.actor` - actor has change due to type change: R4B `actor` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `actor`

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.performer.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationDispense.performer.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Who performed the dispense and what they did

target.display: Who performed the dispense and what they did
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.performer.function` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.performer.function`

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.performer.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.performer.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.performer.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationDispense.performer.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

target.display: Amount dispensed
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.quantity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.quantity`

target.display: Who collected the medication or where the medication was delivered
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.receiver` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `MedicationDispense.receiver` - receiver has change due to type change: R4B `receiver` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `receiver`

element.display: preparation | in-progress | cancelled | on-hold | completed | entered-in-error | stopped | declined | unknown

target.display: preparation | in-progress | cancelled | on-hold | completed | entered-in-error | stopped | declined | unknown
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicationdispense-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicationdispense-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Why a dispense was not performed

target.display: Who the dispense is for
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.subject` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationDispense.subject` - subject made the element mandatory; subject increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1

element.display: Whether a substitution was performed on the dispense

target.display: Whether a substitution was performed on the dispense
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.substitution` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.substitution`

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.substitution.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationDispense.substitution.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.substitution.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.substitution.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.substitution.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationDispense.substitution.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

target.display: Why was substitution made
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.substitution.reason` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.substitution.reason`

element.display: Who is responsible for the substitution

target.display: Who is responsible for the substitution
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.substitution.responsibleParty` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationDispense.substitution.responsibleParty` - responsibleParty changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1); responsibleParty has change due to type change: R4B `responsibleParty` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `responsibleParty`

element.display: Code signifying whether a different drug was dispensed from what was prescribed

target.display: Code signifying whether a different drug was dispensed from what was prescribed
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.substitution.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.substitution.type`

element.display: Whether a substitution was or was not performed on the dispense

target.display: Whether a substitution was or was not performed on the dispense
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.substitution.wasSubstituted` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.substitution.wasSubstituted`

element.display: Information that supports the dispensing of the medication

target.display: Information that supports the dispensing of the medication
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.supportingInformation` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.supportingInformation`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.text`

element.display: Trial fill, partial fill, emergency fill, etc.

target.display: Trial fill, partial fill, emergency fill, etc
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.type`

target.display: When product was given out
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.whenHandedOver` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.whenHandedOver`

element.display: When product was packaged and reviewed

target.display: When product was packaged and reviewed
target.comment: R4B `MedicationDispense.whenPrepared` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationDispense.whenPrepared`
